description:
Ayumi’s wearing special panties meant to drive Haruo wild. Unfortunately, the panties are cursed - and Haruo’s the only person who can get them off! Hopefully he can do it before the guys at school go nuts!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Magi? The Cat Panties Are Cursed?
Noroi no Neko Pantsutte Maji Desuka?
Une culotte à chat maudite, vraiment ?
呪いの猫パンツってマジですか?
